blocks.heading: We are VINHAPAC
blocks.subheading: Delivering trust, partnering with our customers

timeline.event: Foundation established with the creation of the parent company in France, specializing in agricultural trade.
Expanded network to USA and Thailand, diversifying product portfolio into garments and furniture.
Established VINHAPAC in Vietnam, focusing on leveraging local high-quality production and supply capabilities.
Achieved ISO 9001:2015 certification, successfully exporting to over 20 countries, affirming our position as a trusted global partner.

capacityItems.title: Technology
capacityItems.content: Implementing Blockchain-based traceability and ERP systems for transparent supply chain management.

capacityItems.title: Capacity
capacityItems.content: Capability to handle large orders, with an average capacity of 500 containers/year for agricultural products and 1 million products/year for garments.

capacityItems.title: Warehouse Space
capacityItems.content: Total warehouse area over 20,000 m², equipped with modern Warehouse Management System (WMS), ensuring optimal storage and preservation of goods.

capacityItems.title: Partner Factories
capacityItems.content: Network of over 15 strategic manufacturing plants and workshops nationwide, with regular quality audits.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: To become a pioneer in import-export and distribution, building Vietnamese brands with international reach.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: Connecting high-quality supply with domestic and international market demands. Creating sustainable value for partners and communities.

values.name: Credibility
values.description: Commitment to honesty and transparency in all transactions.

values.name: Quality
values.description: Superior products and services meeting all international standards.

values.name: Collaboration
values.description: Building partnerships based on trust and long-term benefits.

values.name: Innovation
values.description: Continuous improvement and adoption of new technologies in management and operations.
